name.baseName: a local branded pure milk productions ; Product transportation
本地品牌纯牛奶生产 ; 产品运输

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: According to the field investigation, light-weight gasoline truck in 2 tonnes of loading capacity is employed to transport the raw milk from the pasture to the processing plant, then to the distribution centre, and their distances are 175 kilometres and 40 kilometres, respectively. Heavy-weight disel truck in 10 tonnes of loading capacity is employed to transport the packaging waste to the municipal landfill, with a distance of 30 kilometres
根据实地调查，使用2吨载重量的轻型汽油卡车将原料奶从牧场运输到加工厂，然后再运输到配送中心，距离分别为175公里和40公里。使用载重量为10吨的重型柴油卡车将包装废物运送到距离30公里的市政垃圾填埋场

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The Tetra Pak 1litre pure liquid milk is selected to assess its lifecycle based carbon footprint.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The milk source base is located at Hongya Country, Southwestern Sichuan Province, China, about 147 kilometres far from Chengdu City, the provincial capital. The diary processing plant is located at Pixian, suburb of Chengdu City, which is about 175 kilometres far from the milk source base. The branded milk is mainly distributed to the central Chengdu City, about 40 kilometres distances from the diary processing plant. The milk packaging waste is transported to the municipal landfill for final disposal, about 30 kilometres away from the central city.
奶源基地位于中国四川省西南部洪崖县，距离省会成都市约147公里。乳品加工厂位于成都郊区郫县，距离奶源基地约175公里。品牌牛奶主要分布在距离乳制品加工厂约40公里的成都市中心。牛奶包装废弃物被运送到距离市中心约30公里的市政垃圾填埋场进行最终处理。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: This study only focused on processes that directly contributed to pure milk production, that is, only the effects of energy and material input and carbon emissions, as shown in Figure 1. The system boundary of milk life cycle is thus simplified and divided into four stages, namely, raw milk production, dairy product processing, product transportation and packaging waste disposal.
本研究仅关注对纯牛奶生产有直接贡献的过程，即仅关注能源和材料投入以及碳排放的影响，如图1所示。从而简化了牛奶生命周期的系统边界，将其划分为原料奶生产、乳制品加工、产品运输和包装废弃物处理四个阶段。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The local branded pure milk undergoes a production and distribution process essential for dairy consumption. The light-weight gasoline trucks are utilized for transporting raw milk from pasture to processing plants and further to distribution centers, catering to the need for fresh dairy delivery. Heavy-weight diesel trucks are used for transporting packaging waste to landfills, indicating an application in waste management and recycling logistics.
本地品牌纯牛奶经历生产和分销过程，为日常乳品消费提供必要的服务。轻型汽油卡车用于将原料奶从牧场运输到加工厂再到分销中心，满足新鲜乳品的配送需求。重型柴油卡车用于将包装废物运输到垃圾填埋场，表明了其在废物管理和回收物流中的应用。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: Compared with the conventional LCA, the process of life cycle impact assessment is simplified in this study, as it mainly uses different categories of indicators to elaborate results of life cycle inventory (Nigri et al., 2014).
与传统的LCA相比，本研究简化了生命周期影响评估的过程，主要使用不同类别的指标来阐述生命周期清单的结果(Nigri et al.， 2014)。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The carbon footprint of product transportation is calculated by transportation loads (tonne·km) multiplying the carbon emissions factor (Cai et al., 2012). According to the field investigation, light-weight gasoline truck in 2 tonnes of loading capacity is employed to transport the raw milk from the pasture to the processing plant, then to the distribution centre, and their distances are 175 kilometres and 40 kilometres, respectively. Heavy-weight disel truck in 10 tonnes of loading capacity is employed to transport the packaging waste to the municipal landfill, with a distance of 30 kilometres. The carbon emissions factors of gasoline and diesel are measured by IPCC (2006), as 164 g per tonne kilometer for 2 tonnes light-weight gasoline truck, 84.8 g per tonne kilometer for 10 tonnes Heavy-weight disel truck, respectively, as shown in Table 3.

产品运输的碳足迹由运输载荷(吨·公里)乘以碳排放系数计算(Cai et al.， 2012)。根据实地调查，使用2吨载重量的轻型汽油卡车将原料奶从牧场运输到加工厂，然后再运输到配送中心，距离分别为175公里和40公里。使用载重量为10吨的重型柴油卡车将包装废物运送到距离30公里的市政垃圾填埋场。汽油和柴油的碳排放系数由IPCC(2006)测量，2吨轻型汽油卡车每吨公里164克，10吨重型柴油卡车每吨公里84.8克，如表3所示。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Zhao, R., Xu, Y., Wen, X., Zhang, N. & Cai, J. Carbon footprint assessment for a local branded pure milk product: a lifecycle based approach. Food Sci. Technol 38, 98–105 (2017).
Zhao, R., Xu, Y., Wen, X., Zhang, N. & Cai, J. Carbon footprint assessment for a local branded pure milk product: a lifecycle based approach. Food Sci. Technol 38, 98–105 (2017).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users should consider only the direct contributions to pure milk production when utilizing this LCA data, focusing specifically on energy and material inputs, as well as carbon emissions during the life cycle stages of raw milk production, dairy processing, product transportation, and packaging waste disposal. The carbon footprint data must be calculated carefully using transportation loads and emissions factors as per IPCC guidelines to ensure accuracy in the impact assessment. It is also advised to contextualize the emissions data within the specific geographic parameters of the Sichuan province area detailed in the description.
使用者在利用此LCA数据时应仅考虑对纯牛奶生产的直接贡献，特别是在原料奶生产、乳品加工、产品运输和包装废弃物处理的生命周期阶段中关注能源和材料投入以及碳排放。碳足迹数据必须根据IPCC指导方针仔细计算运输负荷和排放系数，以确保影响评估的准确性。还建议在描述中详细的四川省区域地理参数内将排放数据具体化。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
